additionalfeatures: Audio Recording, Automatic Face Tracking, Automatic Scene Recognition (SR Auto), DPOF Support, Date/Time Stamp, Digital Image Rotation, Digital Image Stabilization, Exif Print Support, Histogram Display, Instant Zoom, PictBridge Support, Red eye Fix, USB 2.0 Compatibility
connectortypes: 1 x DC power input, 1 x USB, 1 x composite video/audio output
screendetails: LCD display - TFT active matrix - 2.7" - color
lightsensitivity: ISO 100, ISO 1600, ISO 200, ISO 3200 (3Mpix), ISO 400, ISO 64, ISO 6400 (3Mpix), ISO 800, ISO auto
continuousshootingspeed: 1.4 frames per second, 3.3 frames per second (5Mpix), 7.5 frames per second (2Mpix)
flashmodes: Auto Mode, Fill-in Mode, OFF mode, Red-eye Reduction, Slow Synchro
supportedflashmemory: SD Memory Card, SDHC Memory Card
shootingprograms: Beach, Fireworks, Flower, Landscape, Museum, Natural light, Night (tripod), Night mode, Panorama assist, Party/indoor, Portrait mode, Snow, Sports mode, Sunset, Text
